lead_paragraph: The beloved New York nonprofit circus has announced that it is ending its public performances after failing to raise the $2 million it said it needed to stay viable.

headline.print_headline: With No Heroes in Sight, the Big Apple Circus Will Fold Its Tent
headline.main: With No Heroes in Sight, the Big Apple Circus Will Fold Its Tent

snippet: The beloved New York nonprofit circus has announced that it is ending its public performances after failing to raise the $2 million it said it needed to stay viable....
abstract: Big Apple Circus, nonprofit that has entertained New York City audiences for 35 years, will end pubic performances due to financial troubles; fell short of $2 million emergency fund-raising goal, raising only $900,000 that will be used to continue its community programs in nursing homes and hospitals.
